title: Statistical Hypotheses
text:
This page features theories involving statistical hypotheses, including:

Null vs. Alternative Hypothesis
Analogy
Test Statistic
Rejection Region & Significance Levels
Type I and Type II Errors
Power and Statistical Learning
Bootstrapping
Hypothesis Testing with Randomization

title: Inference Models
text:
This page features information about creating and interpreting inference models.

Simple Linear Regression (math, programming, and interpretation)
Multiple Linear Regression (math, programming, and interpretation)

title: Confidence Intervals
text: This page features confidence intervals’ definition, interpretation, and programming.

title: Advanced Statistics
text: A website dedicated to knowledge obtained for the statistics used in data science.

title: Basic Review
text: This page features review of basic statistical concepts and the linear algebra necessary for advanced statistics.
